snippet: To the Editor:    My heart goes out to David Gelernter (Op-Ed, March 30). It's too bad he doesn't belong to my Conservative synagogue. He might have come to shul yesterday and been among the 450 worshipers enjoying the Shabbat service; he then mig...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: My heart goes out to David Gelernter (Op-Ed, March 30). It's too bad he doesn't belong to my Conservative synagogue. He might have come to shul yesterday and been among the 450 worshipers enjoying the Shabbat service; he then might not have said ''Reform and Conservative Judaism are falling apart.'' Here traditional Judaism is not dead. We are the antithesis of falling apart. GERTRUDE KLAUS Highland Park, N.J., March 30, 1997
abstract: Gertrude Klaus letter disputes David Gerelnter's March 30 Op-Ed article on mass suicide by members of Heaven's Gate cult in California (S)

headline.kicker: Cultists' Deaths Call Our Insight Into Question
